name: UpdateCaseDescription
description:
Update the description of a case in Datadog.

Use this tool to modify the description of a specific case in Datadog by providing the case ID and new description details.

parameters.name: case_uuid_or_key
parameters.description: The unique identifier (UUID or key) for the specific case you want to update in Datadog.

parameters.name: new_case_description
parameters.description: Provide the new description text for the case you wish to update. This replaces the current case description.

parameters.name: case_resource_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of resource for the case. It must be 'case'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
